trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the transport must ensure that the URI provided for the service to listen on is unique or can be used exactly as provided.

The URI for the endpoint on which a service listens can be set programmatically using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> property and the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ListenUriMode> for that endpoint is set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
The default value for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is Explicit.

The value of these properties may also be set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A> property and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
When the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ListenUriMode> is set to Unique the transport is responsible for creating a unique URI.
Different transports used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] generate this unique URI differently
For TCP in exclusive mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `false`) this means binding to a uniquely available port number.

For TCP in port sharing mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `true`) and for all of the other existing [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] transports, this means appending a unique path (a GUID) to the end of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.

When the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is set to Explicit mode, the transport uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> exactly as it is provided, without modifying it to make it unique.
Specifies that the transport should use a transport-specific mechanism to ensure that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri"></xref> is unique.
